com.ontolabs.ayllu.grid.classifier

Class ClassifierNodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ontolabs.ayllu.grid.BaseLearnerNode
      • com.ontolabs.ayllu.grid.classifier.ClassifierNodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassifierNode, LearnerNode

    public class ClassifierNodeImpl
extends BaseLearnerNode
implements ClassifierNode
    The Class ClassifierNodeImpl is concrete implementation for Classification. It does classification and uses the confidence measures for sampling needed by the grid's worker.
